translated: Sutra on the Auspicious Signs of the Twelve Links of Dependent Origination, Fascicle 2
Tripiá¹­aka Master from the Western Regions, Chao-san-ta-fu Shih-hung-lu
Shao-qing, Dharma-transmitting Great Master, subject Shi Hu, respectfully translated by imperial decree
It is noted:
The forward progression of the links accumulates days, the reverse flow is the remainder of the dark and bright months, as explained in detail in the sutra.
At that time, the assembly of countless humans and gods said to the World-Honored One:
The cries of crows and birds are unpredictable. How can we understand them?
Please, Buddha, explain.
At that time, the World-Honored One said to the great assembly:
If there are people who carefully observe the twelve links, they will understand joy and sorrow.
If it is the day of the link of ignorance, a crow caws on the right, it brings joy to see wife and children;
if it caws on the left, a traveler will surely come.
On the day of the link of formation, cawing on the right brings peace and good fortune, cawing on the left brings wealth.
On the day of the link of consciousness, cawing on the right means one's hopes will surely be fulfilled;
If it chirps on the left, what is hoped for will not be accomplished.

If it chirps on the right on the name-and-form link, it will gain wealth; if on the left, it will be imprisoned.ğŸ”½ If it chirps on the right on the six sense bases link, it will be frightened; if on the left, there will be a legal dispute.
If it chirps on the right on the contact link, it will be frightened; if on the left, a family member will arrive.
If it chirps on the right on the feeling link, it will be as one wishes;

if on the left, one will gain faith but lose property.ğŸ”½ If it chirps on the right on the craving link, there will be comfort; if on the left, one will gain good faith.ğŸ”½ If it chirps on the right on the grasping link, it will be bitter; if on the left, one will gain comfort and good fortune.
If it chirps on the right on the becoming link, someone will ask about it; if on the left, it will be comfortable and fortunate.
If it chirps on the right on the birth link, what is sought will be combined and as one wishes;
if on the left, one will gain faith but property will be scattered and lost.
If it chirps on the right on the old age and death link, there will be no trouble;
if on the left, there will be destruction and a little property.
At that time the World-Honored One said to the assembly:
If a crow caws in the north on the day of the link of ignorance, one will definitely receive good news.

If a crow caws in the north on the day of the link of karmic formations, there will be joyful events.ğŸ”½If it caws in the north on the day of the link of consciousness, it is auspicious, and one's wishes will be fulfilled.
If it caws in the north on the day of the link of name-and-form, one will hear pleasant news.
If a crow caws in the north on the day of the link of the six sense bases, one will receive news of a long journey, and wealth and treasures are far away, definitely not coming together.
If a crow caws in the north on the day of the link of contact, disputes will arise.

If it caws in the north on the day of the link of feeling, it is auspicious.ğŸ”½If it caws in the north on the day of the link of craving, one will be freed from bondage.ğŸ”½If it caws in the north on the day of the link of grasping, one will suddenly receive good news.
If it caws in the north on the day of the link of becoming, one will definitely obtain clothing and other items.
If it caws in the north on the day of the link of birth, people will come to ask about matters.
If it caws in the north on the day of the link of old age and death, everything is auspicious.
At that time, the great assembly said to the World-Honored One:
How can one know if the upper palate is twitching?
At that time, the World-Honored One said to the great assembly:
If there is a person who remembers and does not forget the twelve links, and fully understands them,
if the link of ignorance causes the upper palate to twitch, a great sage will arrive.
If the link of karmic activity causes the sun to twitch, the head of the family will be at peace.
If the link of consciousness causes the upper palate to twitch, a sage will definitely come.
If the link of name-and-form causes the twitching, one will obtain much wealth.
If the link of the six sense bases causes the twitching, afflictions will arise in the mind.
If the link of contact causes the upper palate to twitch, it will be pleasing and delightful.
If the link of sensation causes the sun to twitch, there will be frightening events.
If the link of craving causes the sun to twitch, the family wealth will increase.
If the link of grasping causes the sun to twitch, someone in the middle will die.ğŸ”½If the link of becoming causes the sun to twitch, a sage will come.
If the link of birth causes the sun to twitch, thieves will definitely arrive.
If the link of old age and death causes the twitching, there will be harmony in the household.
If a person observes the twelve links and understands sorrow and joy,
in the link of ignorance, the mind trembles above, and there are afflictions of disputes.
The link of action trembles during the day, and one obtains wealth.
The link of consciousness trembles in the mind, and there are frightening events.
The link of name-and-form trembles in the mind, and parents are delighted.
The link of the six sense bases trembles, and the sought-after matter is combined and appears.
The link of contact trembles in the mind, and parents are frightened.
The link of feeling trembles in the mind, and one should avert it by going south, then it will be auspicious.
The link of craving trembles in the mind, and one obtains great sorrow.
The link of grasping trembles in the mind, and an evil person arrives.
The link of becoming trembles in the mind, and there is a matter of sorrow and sadness.
The link of birth trembles in the mind, and there is certainly great fear.
The link of old age and death trembles above the mind during the day, and the old one will certainly die.
At that time, the great assembly again said to the Buddha:
These twelve links have these auspicious signs, but I am still unable to understand their daily activities. How should I proceed? Please explain.
At that time, the World-Honored One said to the great assembly:

If there are people, on the days of the links of ignorance and of formations, who gather for banquets, decorate their fields and houses, consult on matters and see the noble, wash their heads and so forth, it is auspicious;
but bathing and making clothes should not be used.
On the day of the link of formations, seeking matters, listening to the Dharma, learning archery, subduing enemies, bathing and associating with the noble are all suitable to be used well;
but washing the head has problems, and making clothes will lead to defeat, so do not use them.

On the day of the link of consciousness, the king receiving the consecration, subduing enemies, gathering the army, cultivating and building villages, state offices, and houses, all accomplishments are auspicious. Washing the hair, throat, and neck, and making clothes should be used;
but bathing will lead to fear, so be very careful.
If it is the day of the name-and-form link, all tasks that are done, as well as tasks that are done permanently, shaving the hair and nails, storing wealth and goods, are all suitable to be used;
washing the head causes the complexion to change, bathing causes alarm, if making clothes at that time, joy is obtained but quickly destroyed.

On the day of the six sense bases link, the king receives the consecration, repairs the village, achieves completion, others should not pay homage, moves to a new house, wealth and goods are far away, collecting protection obtains the crime;
if bathing at that time, parents are alarmed, if washing the head at that time, fame is fearless.
On the day of the contact link, doing good is not accomplished, evil events harm people, criminal offenses are quickly accomplished.

On the day of the grasping link, everything that is done, parents are alarmed, bathing and making clothes, loved ones are not for long, there must be blood light, making clothes but not bathing, it is not suitable to wear them.
On the day of the receiving link, the sought-after matters are joyful, trading and giving, repairing the monastery, and auspicious events should be used;
washing the head is frightening, obtaining what is not intended, if making clothes, what is hoped for is not difficult, it is auspicious to wear in front of friends.
On the day of the craving link, provisions and precious treasures should be collected and protected;
minor and urgent actions cause great worry, washing the hair fails, making clothes is fulfilled.
On the day of the grasping link, children's hair should be shaved, and minor matters should be used;
masters ordain disciples, shave beards and hair, take medicine, send guests, marry, auspicious and wealthy, bathing obtains wealth, making clothes encounters joy.

On the day of the becoming link, making acquaintances and friends, and all matters, disputes and arguments should be avoided, do not use washing the head, making clothes and bathing are all auspicious and joyful.ğŸ”½Here is the corrected and aligned text:
On the day of the birth link, decorating the house, carriages, horses, storehouses, seeing important ministers and lords are all auspicious and suitable to be used;
bathing and traveling far are also suitable to be used, as well as washing the head, being happy, making clothes that are not worn for a long time, and wearing them on the day.

On the day of the aging and death link, evil events that arise, the wealthy lose their wealth, doing beneficial things and discussing matters, staying away from all that is not right, washing the head quickly obtains, food and drink are mostly delicious, bathing the mind is troubled, making clothes lasts long.
Then the assembly said to the World-Honored One:
The twitching of the feet, the trembling of the earth, the cawing of crows, the barking of dogs, the injury of oil, fire, and rats, the good and evil are not yet clear, please explain it for us.
At that time, the World-Honored One said to the great assembly:
If there are people who contemplate and examine the twelve links, they should know the good and evil.
Why is it so?
On the day of the ignorance link, the twitching of the feet brings joy.
On the day of the link of existence, if the foot throbs, the head shakes, and the affairs of the master are inauspicious, do not use it.
On the day of the link of consciousness and name-and-form, there will be disputes.
On the day of the link of the six sense bases, if the foot throbs, a person will die.
On the day of the links of contact, feeling, and craving, if the foot throbs, disputes will arise.
On the day of the link of grasping, if the foot throbs, a person will die.
On the day of the link of becoming, if the foot throbs, one will obtain clothing.ğŸ”½ If the foot throbs on the day of the link of birth, there will be danger from thieves and illness.
On the day of the link of old age and death, if the foot throbs, one will experience sorrowful events.
Furthermore, observing the twelve links of dependent origination, on the day of the link of ignorance, if the foot throbs and moves, there will be robbery;
if the dog in the house barks, people will come to ask about distant matters;
if the clothes burn, there will be no problem;
if a rat gnaws at the clothes, danger will come;
if there is a crow cawing, family members will come to ask;
if the clothes are stained with oil, a person will suddenly receive news;
If the earth moves, the king's grace will be universally bestowed.
On the day of the action stage, if the foot trembles, it is auspicious to go out;
if a dog barks, there will be minor royal affairs;
if a crow cries, good news will surely arrive;
and if one sees blood or fire on one's clothes, one will experience joy;
if a rat bites one's clothes, one will attain great wealth and nobility;
if one's clothes are stained with oil, one will obtain many possessions;
if the earth moves, there will be a famine, killing, and invasion by foreign countries.
On the day of the consciousness stage, if the foot trembles, a non-human will arrive;
if a dog barks, thieves will arrive and one will obtain possessions;
if a crow cries, a dispute will arise;
if one's clothes burn, one will gain something;
if a rat bites one's clothes, one will lose and regain wealth;
if one's clothes are stained with oil, one's parents will be frightened;
if the earth moves, two kings will swallow each other.
On the day of the name-and-form link, if the foot throbs, one obtains wealth without seeking it;ğŸ”½If a dog barks, a person suddenly arrives;
If a crow cries, a loved one comes;
If clothes are gnawed by rats, lost wealth returns;
If clothes burn, there is joy;
If clothes are soiled with oil, an important person thinks of one;
When there is an earthquake, enemies arise, but the country becomes peaceful after they are eliminated.
On the day of the six sense bases link, if the foot throbs, a friend comes from afar and the family is safe and secure;
If a dog barks, there is a dispute;
If a crow cries, a person comes to reconcile;
If clothes are gnawed by rats, someone drowns and dies;
If clothes are burned, one obtains wealth through a dispute;
If clothes are soiled with oil, there is a frightening event;
When there is an earthquake, an elder dies.
On the day of the contact link, if the foot throbs, one hears good news;
If the dog at home barks, thieves come;
If a crow cries, there is fear;
When clothes are damaged by rats, one obtains wealth;
When clothes are burned by fire, it indicates sudden events with people;
When clothes are soiled by oil, one obtains joy from relatives;
There will be disputes due to earthquakes.
On the day of the receiving link, when the feet twitch, going out is auspicious;
When the dog at home barks, a holy one will arrive;
When clothes are damaged by rats, one will surely see the master;
When clothes are burned by fire, there will be minor matters arising;
When clothes are soiled by oil, one obtains what is disagreeable;
When there is an earthquake, distant news will surely arrive.
On the day of the craving link, when the feet twitch, one obtains wealth;
When the dog barks at an inappropriate time, there will surely be anger and disputes;
If a crow sings, one hears news from one's child;
When clothes are damaged by rats, someone will surely die suddenly;
When clothes are burned by fire, one obtains wealth;
When clothes are soiled by oil, there is good news;
When there is an earthquake, enemies will surely rise, and there will be a mission coming from the east.
On the day of the grasping link, if the foot trembles, one will incur guilt, and people will suddenly have faith;
If a dog barks at an inappropriate time, there will be disputes;ğŸ”½If a crow cries, there will be sudden trouble with relatives;
If a rat damages clothes, famine will come;
If clothes are damaged by fire, one will surely obtain something;
If clothes are stained by oil, one will lose property;
If there is an earthquake, an external enemy will invade.
On the day of the becoming link, if the foot trembles, thieves will come and one will hear news;
If a dog barks at an inappropriate time, the land will be unstable;ğŸ”½If a crow cries, one will surely obtain wealth;
If clothes are damaged by a rat, a family thief will surely come;
If clothes are damaged by fire, one will obtain delicious food and drink;
If clothes are stained by oil, there will be joy, and the earth will be abundant and ripe.
On the day of the birth link, if the foot trembles, a long journey will arrive quickly;ğŸ”½If a dog barks at an inappropriate time, there will be joyful events;
If a crow cries, there will be peace without incident;
If rats damage clothes, one will obtain much wealth;
If clothes are burned by fire, household goods will increase;
If clothes are stained with oil, there will be joy;
If there is an earthquake, there will be an army coming.
On the day of the branch of old age and death, if the foot trembles, disputes are empty;
If a dog barks at the wrong time, a friend will come from afar;
If a crow cries, there will be a dispute;
If clothes are damaged by rats, wealth will be lost;ğŸ”½If clothes are burned by fire, there will be prison difficulties;
If clothes are stained with oil, there will be a dispute;
If there is an earthquake, difficulties will come from the east.
At that time, the World-Honored One further told the great assembly:

If there are people who contemplate and do not forget the twelve links of dependent origination, they will certainly be able to understand faraway worries, joys, and other matters.ğŸ”½On the day of the link of ignorance, one should protect one's wealth.
On the day of the link of karmic formations, one should collect and give away wealth.
On the day of the consciousness link, it is suitable to learn skills.
On the day of the name-and-form link, it is auspicious for relatives.ğŸ”½ On the day of the six sense bases link, it is auspicious to conclude affairs.
On the day of the contact link, it is suitable to deal with enemies.
On the day of the feeling link, it is suitable for marriage.
On the day of the craving link, it is suitable to carry out the king's orders and prohibit wrongdoing.
On the day of the grasping link, it is suitable to know important matters.
On the day of the birth, old age, and death link, it is suitable to engage in unlawful activities, but not proper conduct.
At that time, the great assembly said to the World-Honored One:
When divining these twelve links, how should one proceed?
At that time, the World-Honored One said to the assembly:

If someone wishes to seek divination on the day of the ignorance link, they will obtain wealth, saddles, and horses, all auspicious. It is suitable for relatives to gather, but not for permanent matters.
On the day of the link of existence, if one consults for a matter, going out, eating and drinking, thinking of a child, remembering a friend, speaking the Dharma are all auspicious.

On the day of the link of consciousness, if one consults for a matter, the matter should not be moved or delighted, form a connection with a friend who knows consciousness, do not give rise to afflictions, the matter will be accomplished, and calamities and difficulties will be removed.
On the day of the link of name-and-form, if one consults for a matter, there will be fear and afflictions, the matter will be scattered everywhere, and there will be separation from bones and flesh.
On the day of the link of the six sense bases, if one consults for a matter, one will obtain wealth, honor, and the delight of one's wife and family, and sons and daughters will be honored.
On the day of the link of contact, if one consults for a matter, there will be disputes, fear of thieves, worries, unreasonable difficulties, and disharmony among relatives.
On the day of the link of feeling, if one consults for a matter, one will obtain much wealth, food, drink, clothing, and the delight of one's wife and family, and will be fully adorned.
On the day of the craving link, if one seeks divination and asks about matters, mental thoughts and scheming, false requests, and all are not accomplished.
On the day of the grasping link, if one seeks divination and asks about matters, those who see are delighted, praise and protect, the seat and vehicle, wealth gains much joy.
On the day of the becoming link, if one seeks divination and asks about matters, one obtains fear of royal law, destruction and worry, bones and flesh scattered.
On the day of the birth link, if one seeks divination and asks about matters, one obtains great wealth, all in harmony, perfectly accomplished, friends are delighted, cherished and praised.

On the day of the aging and death link, if one seeks divination and asks about matters, false good and evil, destroyed and scattered, without essence, matters are empty and greatly worried, greed and anger arise frequently.
At that time, after the World-Honored One had spoken this Dharma, he told the great assembly:

If there are people who carefully contemplate the twelve links of dependent origination, understand good and evil, joy and sorrow, gain and loss, they should draw a turning wheel and write it clearly;

That is, from ignorance up to old age and death, the positions of the months and days, arranged in sequence, rats, oxen, tigers, rabbits, dragons, snakes, horses, sheep, monkeys, chickens, dogs, and pigs, the twelve appearances, the original form turning, explained in sequence to people.
At that time, the great assembly, hearing the Buddha's teachings, rejoiced and delighted, and faithfully accepted and practiced them.
The Sutra on Auspicious Omens of the Twelve Links of Dependent Origination, Fascicle 2
